item.description: Upon RSVPing for this meetup you will vote on the type of Ethnic cuisine you would be interested in going out to eat. You may suggest a restaurant in the comment section as this meetup is totally up to the members. Once a decent number of people have RSVP'd i'll tally up the votes and thats where we will go. Lets get out and try some interesting food. Maybe from some far off country. I'm leaving the date up to the group, as this month is busy, only weeknights are available in October, If we decide upon a weekend night, we'll make it for November.. its up to you!!
item.name: Ethnic Dining Experience
